scripts.deploy-patch: cd ./react && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && cd ../reactnative && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.deploy-minor: cd ./react && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && cd ../reactnative && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.deploy-major: cd ./react && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && cd ../reactnative && npm version major && npm publish
